title: An embargo on (most) Russian oil
description: European leaders have finally agreed on a Russian oil embargo. What are the implications? How long will it take to enforce and what should be the next steps? Bruegel’s Giuseppe Porcaro is joined by MEP Luis Garicano, Simone Tagliapietra and Georg Zachmann to talk sanctioning Russia.
itunes:summary: A timely reflection on the EU’s latest round of sanctions banning Russian oil imports.
itunes:author: Bruegel
dc:creator: Bruegel
